title: Inspections
context: ยง486M-5 Inspections. The chief of police of each county or the chief of police&rsquo;s authorized representative may immediately inspect, during normal business hours or whenever the dealer or the dealer&rsquo;s agents or employees are otherwise present, any records required by this chapter and any articles described in such records that the police reasonably believe are stolen goods. [L 1982, c 282, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985; am L 1991, c 120, pt of ยง1]
